title: At Avdiyivka direction Russian army shelled Novobakhmutivka, Berdychi, Semenivka, Pervomayske and Nevelske of Donetsk region....
content: At Avdiyivka direction Russian army shelled Novobakhmutivka, Berdychi, Semenivka, Pervomayske and Nevelske of Donetsk region. Russian aviation conducted airstrikes at Novobakhmutivka, Ocheretyne, Umanske of Donetsk region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
